anime.description: The protagonist who lost his parents at a young age, and wants to live by his own capability, "Chrono Shindou". The cool and handsome boy who received a special education in fencing, and is popular in class, "Shion Kiba". The attractive Tokyoite girl with good grades, "Tokoha Anjou". With these 3 protagonists as the center, a new story begins. A new clan that nobody has ever seen, "Gear Chronicle." When this mysterious deck ends up in Chrono`s hands, the fates of these 3 previously unconnected people shall intertwine! Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: shounen
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shounen, literally meaning "youth" and often also specifically "boy", refers to a male audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

tag.name: proxy battles
tag.description: In our terms, a proxy battle is a battle where humans use creatures/robots to do the fighting for them, either by commanding those creatures/robots or by simply evolving them/changing them into battle mode. Often the training aspect is also involved, or in some cases the proxies are nothing more than holographic representatives of some other variation of competition (like for example a card game). While many popular shounen anime fit under this category, it`s not limited to shounen anime.

episode.title: 福原の『綺』公子
The Ki Prince of Fukuhara
Fukuhara no "Ayaginu" Kimiko
episode.summary: Shion Kiba enters Fukuhara High School in order to master his studies, sport, and Vanguard. But the Fukuhara High School Vanguard Club is in danger of being abolished! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カズマの儀式[リチュアル]
Kazuma`s Ritual
Kazuma no Ritual
episode.summary: Taiyou Asukawa challenges Kazuma to a fight to gauge his strength. And the power hidden within Kazuma now awakens!! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 覚醒を待つ竜
Dragon Awaiting Awakening
Kakusei o Matsu Ryuu
episode.summary: Chrono starts searching for teammates to take part in the U20 Championship. While searching, he meets Kazuma Shouji. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Welcome to the NEXT STAGE!!
Welcome to the Next Stage!!
Welcome to the Next Stage!!
episode.summary: Chrono Shindou, Shion Kiba and Tokoha Anjou of TRY3 have since entered high school, and in order to take hold of their own separate futures, each of them has formed their own teams, and will clash as rivals in the U20 Championship! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 女王と策謀の微笑み
Smile of Queen and Schemes
Joou to Sakubou no Hohoemi
episode.summary: The Fukuhara High School Vanguard Club goes in search of a 3rd teammate. Shion has decided on the senior Rin Hashima but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: クロスオーバー
Crossover
Crossover
episode.summary: Chrono and Shion have formed their teams, and engage in an exchange match at the Dragon Empire Branch! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 開花する私の未来
My Future in Bloom
Kaika Suru Watashi no Mirai
episode.summary: Tokoha searches for her path after choosing to study on her own overseas in Paris. Jaime introduces Miguel, another youth aiming to become a professional cardfighter, to Tokoha. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 涙の海を越えて
Overcoming the Sea of Tears
Namida no Umi o Koete
episode.summary: Tokoha couldn`t accept the harsh reality, and is lost in sorrow. To overcome the tragedy and ride towards the future, she challenges Jaime to a fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 花は眩しく咲き誇る
The Flower will Bloom Radiantly
Hana wa Mabushiku Sakihokoru
episode.summary: Tokoha returns with a mysterious masked-man, searching for teammates to compete in the U20 Championship with. An unexpected guest awaits Tokoha when she visits the Dragon Empire branch. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 超えられない存在(モノ)
An Unsurpassable Existence
Koerarenai Sonzai (Mono)
episode.summary: Chrono and his friends challenge the special qualifiers at the Dragon Empire branch to earn the ticket to the U20 Championship.\NAnd the opponent that appeared before Kazuma, was none other than Tokoha`s brother, Mamoru Anjou. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 俺はお前を...!
To me, you are...!
Ore wa Omae o...!
episode.summary: Kazuma Shouji is leaving the team. Unable to accept it, Chrono Shindou chases after Kazuma, but is mistakenly taken to see the "Boss" of those underlings…! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦!!! ストライダーズVSトリニティドラゴン!!!
Deciding Match!!! Striders VS Trinity Dragon!!!
Kessen!!! Striders Vs Trinity Dragon!!!
episode.summary: The fierce fight between Striders and Trinity Dragon draws to a close. Carrying the feelings of their team mates, the final match between Chrono Shindou and Tsuneto Tado begins. Who`s team will be the one participating in the U20!? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後のチャンス
The Last Chance
Saigo no Chance
episode.summary: It`s the last day of the U20 shop qualifiers… At Card Capital, as the Striders believe in the return of Kazuma Shouji, the opponents standing in their way are none other than the Trinity Dragon. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Are you ready to FIGHT!!
Are you ready to FIGHT!!
Are You Ready to Fight!!
episode.summary: A spectacular party is held to raise the morale of the three teams of Striders, Fukuhara High School Vanguard Club, and Jaime Flowers. What are they thinking about right before the main competition? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 乱戦!! ファーストステージ
Battlefield!! First Stage
Ransen!! First Stage
episode.summary: The "First Stage" of the U20 Championship begins! The battlefield is none other than… Planet Cray!? The battle for survival of the young fighters commences. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ニッポンの夜明け
Dawn of Nippon
Nippon no Yoake
episode.summary: Kazuma Shouji undermines and struggles against the Makoto Asada of Team New Nippon. Supporting Team New Nippon in a cool manner, Makoto`s strength materializes from the friendship he holds deep in his heart. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 光の道標
Signpost of Light
Hikari no Michishirube
episode.summary: Tokoha Anjou has to fight against Taiyou Asukawa. Regardless of their friendship, only the winner can proceed…! As Tokoha resolves on the fight, Taiyou undergoes special training for the U20. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 漢[おとこ]と漢[おとこ]
Mano A Mano
Otoko to Otoko
episode.summary: Satoru Enishi encounters Kamui Katsuragi. Against Enishi, who is still finding his real fight, Kamui launches consecutive attacks without mercy. Will Enishi be able to overcome this predicament? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 渇望の摩天楼
Sorrow Skyscraper
Katsubou no Matenrou
episode.summary: Wanting to leave the team, Rin Hashima challenges Shion Kiba. Will Shion be able to defeat Rin and kept the team together? As Henri Hayao watches restlessly, the fight between the "Ki" Prince and the Queen ensues. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不屈の海賊姫[かいぞくき]
Unyielding Pirate
Fukutsu no Kaizokuki
episode.summary: Rummy Labyrinth with Saya hypes up the U20. Wanting to make amends for the past, Am faces off against Henri Hayao. With Shion Kiba`s team mate as her opponent, what will Am do… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魅惑の奇術[マギア]
Fascinating Magia
Miwaku no Magia
episode.summary: The opponent that Kazuma Shouji matches against is none other than Luna Yumizuki of Rummy Labyrinth. Fascinated by the sweet techniques of Pale Moon units that Luna displays with the power of imagination, will Kazuma have his heart stolen...!? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忍び寄る脅威
Creeping Menace
Shinobiyoru Kyoui
episode.summary: The First Stage is suspended due to the power outage of the faulty machines. Kazumi Onimaru takes advantage of the confusion, and Kouji Ibuki tails him. Their paths cross in the darkness. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 強く激しく美しく
Strong, Violent, and Beautiful
Tsuyoku Hageshiku Utsukushiku
episode.summary: The First Stage is coming to an end on the third day. Destined to battle against each other for the third time, the serious face-off between Tokoha Anjou and Rin Hashima unfolds. With their full fighting spirit clasing, what will be the outcome of their fight...? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 騎士は剣[つるぎ]に勝利を誓う
The Knights Swear Victory Upon Their Swords
Kishi wa Tsurugi ni Shouri o Chikau
episode.summary: Shion Kiba`s next opponent is none other than the one who defeated Tokoha Anjou on the second day, Taiyou Asukawa. The battle of the two paladins for their friendship and their team begins. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 終幕のカオス
Chaos of the End
Shuumaku no Chaos
episode.summary: Noa Hoshizaki appears in front of Chrono Shindou. During the "last fight" of the First Stage of U20 Championship that everyone is focused on, Chrono witnesses a repulsive image upon noticing the unusual appearance of Noa. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 帰還の先導者[ヴァンガード]!
Return of the Vanguard!
Kikan no Vanguard!
episode.summary: The First Stage ended with a number of unsolved mysteries. Chrono gets invited to Card Capital by Kamui. All the fighters that used to fight there have assembled, but none of them seem to be able to maintain their composure… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: クロノVSアイチ
Chrono VS Aichi
Kurono vs Aichi
episode.summary: Chrono accepts a fight from Aichi, who returned from overseas. Supported by Kamui and Shin, who know both of the fighters very well, Aichi is determined to ignite Chrono`s fighting spirit with his strong imagination and bonds with his units. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 伊吹の試練
Ibuki`s Trial
Ibuki no Shiren
episode.summary: Ibuki meets up with Chrono and challenges him abruptly, "If you cannot defeat me, forget about everything and leave.". Will Chrono have the power and resolution to defeat Ibuki`s relentless attacks? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 異世界からの憑依者[ディフライダー]
Diffrider
Isekai kara no Difrider
episode.summary: Visiting "Nome Tatsunagi", head of the Tatsunagi Foundation. Nome, who watches over the fate of Cray and Earth, reveals the truth behind the events that are happening. Who exactly are the "Diffriders", who hide their right hand…? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あの日見た輝き
The Light from Before
Ano Hi Mita Kagayaki
episode.summary: The Second Stage of the U20 Championship, a battle royale where the objective is to race to the top of the castle. Taiyou encounters Verno from Team Diffrider, and the harsh rule of this stage is that players that lose can no longer participate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 脆弱なる生物達
Fragile Living Things
Zeijakunaru Seibutsu-tachi
episode.summary: Tokoha`s opponent is none other than Saori of Team Diffrider, who participated in place of Miguel. To live up to Miguel`s expectations, Tokoha renews her determination in her fight against Saori, but Saori denies her determination, and mocks Miguel`s death. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 邪眼の支配者
Evil Eye Sovereign
Yokoshimame no Shihaisha
episode.summary: Onimaru is merciless against Rummy Labyrinth and Kumi, and makes a fool of their "enjoyable fight". Defending their fight as a knight, Enishi makes his move on the "power of taboo"of Onimaru`s Nubatama. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 人間の可能性
Potential of Humans
Ningen no Kanousei
episode.summary: Saori is frustrated at the discomfort of the fight with Tokoha. Chrono clashes with all his might against Saori, who behaves conspicuously as a unit, and looks down on fights against humans as "games". Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 兄との再会
Brothers` Reunion
Ani to no Saikai
episode.summary: As the fight between Chrono and Saori unfolds, Kazuma gets a rematch with Onimaru. Kazuma tries his best in the fated fight between brothers, but the Onimaru in front of his eyes is no longer the "brother" from that day. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の解放
Liberation from Destiny
Unmei no Kaihou
episode.summary: Chrono is shocked by the relationship between Kazuma and Onimaru. Kazuma challenges Shiranui, who pretends to be Onimaru himself, to settle the fight. The frightening objective of Shiranui, who took over Onimaru`s body and violated the U20, comes to light. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 福原の選択
Fukuhara`s Choice
Fukuhara no Sentaku
episode.summary: Team Fukuhara proceeds according to Shion`s strategy, and makes it to day 2 with none of the team members dropping out. However, Hayao notices Shion`s plan to sacrifice himself for the team, and ignores that strategy…! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 俺達のヴァンガード
Our Vanguard
Oretachi no Vanguard
episode.summary: Regaining his freedom, Shion challenges Chrono at his best. The two of them fought with all they have, like the way they fought when they first met. The heat from their fight fascinates all the fighters at the stage…! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: この空の先に
Beyond this Sky
Kono Sora no Saki ni
episode.summary: Second Stage ends, but only 3 teams can proceed. A repechage has been confirmed, but before that, Chrono and Ibuki tell the others about the Diffriders at an island in the south… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復活の狼煙
Beacon of Revival
Fukkatsu no Noroshi
episode.summary: The repechage between Rummy Labyrinth with Saya and Jaime Flowers. Knowing the truth of the Diffriders, Tokoha composes herself and reaches for the ticket to the Final Stage with a fight against Saya. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ストライダーズの誓い
Oath of Striders
Striders no Chikai
episode.summary: Chrono and Taiyou reflect upon the past battles and head towards the Final Stage. Together with Kazuma, the Striders steel their resolves for the final battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 福原高校ヴァンガード部VSチーム・ディフライダー
Fukuhara High Vanguard Club VS Team Diffrider
Fukuhara Koukou Vanguard Bu VS Team Diffrider
episode.summary: Rin and Henri aims to win regardless of Diffriders being their opponents. Rin`s fighting spirit reaches Verno, but Henri`s fight with Saori is…… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天命を超えて
Overcoming Heaven`s Decree
Tenmei o Koete
episode.summary: Hayao and Shion are utterly defeated by Saori and Onimaru. Shion, who overcomes any and all adversities, and Kazumi, who wishes to rebel against his fate. The fight between these two against their destinies are fiercer than ever. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ストライダーズVSハイメフラワーズ
Striders VS Jaime Flowers
Striders VS Jaime Flowers
episode.summary: The second fight of the deciding match between Striders and Jaime Flowers. Kumi, with her appreciation towards her companions, and Taiyou, with his emotions for Vanguard, are pushed to their limits. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 胸を焦がす熱さ
Heat of Searing Heart
Mune o Kogasu Atsusa
episode.summary: Another face off between members of TRY3! Chrono and Tokoha renew their determination and battle against each other. With the ticket to the finals on the line, it`s an all-out exchange of blows. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神崎との特訓
Special Training with Kanzaki
Kanzaki to no Tokkun
episode.summary: Kazuma suggests a special training to steel their resolutions and is invited by Chrono and Taiyou deep into the mountains. The one that they meet is none other than the strongest Shadow Paladin fighter, Yuichirou Kanzaki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ベルノの挑戦
Verno`s Challenge
Verno no Chousen
episode.summary: Verno challenges Tokoha to a fight on the day before the finals of the U20 Championship. During the fight where their ideals clash, Verno finds out about the identity and objective of Kazumi. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 輝きの果てに
To the Limit of Radiance
Kagayaki no Hate ni
episode.summary: The first match of the finals of U20 Championship has Taiyou VS Verno. Can Taiyou overcome Verno`s radiance with all his might in his final fight for Earth? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 覚醒の竜
Dragon`s Awakening
Kakusei no Ryuu
episode.summary: During the semifinal match, Saori fights with complete hatred akin to an intent to kill. Overcoming the unfeeling wall of smouldering flames, the dragon`s "awakening" is achieved for the world it seeks. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 兄弟決戦
Battle of the Brothers
Kyoudai Kessen
episode.summary: Kazumi and Kazuma look back upon their forgotten childhood memories during the fight. Kazuma bets everything on the final hit to save his brother and overcome the past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 託された思い
Entrusted Wishes
Takusareta Omoi
episode.summary: It`s the final match of the U20 Championship! With the wishes entrusted upon him, Chrono envisions the memories of Shiranui, who is possessing Kazumi`s body. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 超える力
Power to Overcome
Koeru Chikara
episode.summary: To grab hold of the future, and show Kazumi the Vanguard he believes in, the fight where Chrono puts his all unfolds. The answer that Shiranui receives at the end of that fight is…… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 帰還
Return
Kikan
episode.summary: The U20 Championship concludes, with Chrono and gang returning to their daily routine. However, Shiranui left behind the memories of the "master" within Kazumi. Source: crunchyroll
